description: C# has been an active, popular language of choice for all kinds of software development - from webapps to desktop applications to video games. I have worked to be familiariazed with the best practices of modern C#, and its associated frameworks.

Rust is a fast, ergonomic, and maintainable language. The ownership system has influenced the way I write in other languages - side-effects are one of the biggests issues with maintainable software, and Rust mitigates the problem in a way that is a joy to work with, in the same performance tier as C/C++.
Javascript is highly demanded among businesses, especially given it's benefits in full-stack web development. I've found great integration between it and Vue.js for fullstack development.

While programming is the most prominent part of software development, today's industry relies on a DevOps mindset, where developers can easily integrate their builds into a runtime environment. My education and personal training has helped me understand the nuances of several Google Cloud systems.
